                                    :op1 "Prince"

                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Meghan"
                                    :op2 "Markle")))

                              :ARG1 (s / street)))))
      :ARG1 (a3 / adore-01

                  :topic (f / family
                        :mod (r2 / royal)
                        :mod (c2 / country
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Britain"))))
